docs.snippet: It’s not news that we write a lot about Brooklyn, but we now seem to be using the borough as the measuring stick or point of comparison for everywhere....
docs.abstract: It’s not news that we write a lot about Brooklyn, but we now seem to be using the borough as the measuring stick or point of comparison for everywhere.

docs.snippet: The eccentric Los Angeles-based singer-songwriter discusses his bewilderment at other people’s grooming routines, accidentally inventing “throwback hipster chic” and why he wears a Bart Simpson T-shirt to the airport....
docs.abstract: The eccentric Los Angeles-based singer-songwriter discusses his bewilderment at other people’s grooming routines, accidentally inventing “throwback hipster chic” and why he wears a Bart Simpson T-shirt to the airport.

headline.main: Ariel Pink on Gender-Bending, His Aversion to Suits and the Pleasures of Red Clogs
